post:
Hi Folks,

Offers below, I have tried to give something good in each location:

**UK**
**---**

**OFFER 1**

2 Cores (Equal Share)
128MB Ram
128MB Swap
7GB HDD
300GB Bandwidth @ 100mbit
1 x IPv4
5 x IPv6

PROMO CODE: LETDEC128

Order Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=55

PRICE: €18.00 p/year ($23.72)

**FREE Upgrade choice:

1) Upgrade disk to 10 GB
2) Upgrade Bandwidth to 350 GB**

Enter your upgrade choice (not both) during checkout in the notes or open a ticket, note that disk upgrades will require a reboot.

**------------------------------------------**


**Build Your Own Yearly Package**
**Any Location**

Base package:

1 CPU Core
96MB Ram
96MB Swap
5GB Disk
100 GB Transfer
1x IPv4
5 x IPv6 (excluding USA)

Base Price p/year: €12.00

Extra 32MB Ram = €2.5 p/year (USA/UK)
Extra 32MB Ram NL = €4.00 p/Year (NL)
Extra 2GB Disk = €2.00 p/year
Extra 100GB Transfer = €1.00 p/year

If you would like to build your own please use the contact form: http://inceptionhosting.com/contact/

Specify your package, you will get a reply confirming the price with further instructions within 24 hours.


**Make me an offer**

Sick of seeing all these set in stone offers, tell me what you want and how much you want to pay and on what term e.g. monthly, yearly etc.

You can do that here or via http://inceptionhosting.com/contact/ if it is not strictly a LEB qualifying price, if it can be done it will be done.

**------------------------------------------------**

Anthony.
